item.description:
Human beings have been seeking happiness throughout the ages. This workshop will use practical tools from the worlds greatest philosophical traditions and from the Peaceful Warrior series of Dan Millman. Discovering our values shapes the nature of our relationship to ourselves and those around us. Learn to go beyond limits to achieve the optimum level of happiness.

The cost is $15 in advance, and $20 at the door. It is possible to pay by cash/check at the school in Porter Square or online by credit card or PayPal through our website www.acropolisboston.org

Â

group.name: Practical Philosophy -- Application of Timeless Wisdom

item.name: Living the Life you were meant to Live! (a workshop)
